ValidationRule.description: If associated account is of Mexican and Tax ID on the account is blank and Opportunity Stage is either 'Purchase' or past 'Purchase' stage then the message is displayed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), NOT(ISBLANK( Account.BillingCountry )), Account.BillingCountry ='Mexico', ISBLANK(Account.VATId__c) , Probability >= 0.9, NOT(ISPICKVAL(MX_Approval_status__c,"Approved" )), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Revenue Opportunity") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please input the entity's RFC # in the Tax ID field on the account. If you do not enter the entity's RFC #, opportunities associated with this account will bel blocked from moving to the Purchase stage or later stages
